solution_line_template: The number of chairs at the round tables is {num_round_tables} tables * {chairs_per_round_table} chairs/table = <<{num_round_tables}*{chairs_per_round_table}={chairs_round_tables}>>{chairs_round_tables}.

The number of chairs at rectangular tables is {num_rectangular_tables} tables * {chairs_per_rectangular_table} chairs/table = <<{num_rectangular_tables}*{chairs_per_rectangular_table}={chairs_rectangular_tables}>>{chairs_rectangular_tables}.
There are {chairs_round_tables} chairs + {chairs_rectangular_tables} chairs = <<{chairs_round_tables}+{chairs_rectangular_tables}={total_chairs}>>{total_chairs} chairs in the canteen.
